content.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(CONCAT([Month],'01') AS DATE) AS [KPIDate]
	,DATEPART(YEAR,CONCAT([Month],'01')) AS [Year]
    ,FORMAT(CAST(CONCAT([Month],'01') AS DATE),'MMM') AS [Month]
	,'FG Trading' AS [Entity]	    
	,[Product]		
	,[Other_Revenue_Details]
    ,[Trading/Own_Produced]
    ,[Counterparty]
    ,[Volume_Type]
	,[ValueType]
    ,[Plan_Year]
    ,[Volume]
    ,[Price]
	,[Total_Revenue]
	
FROM 
(
--Actual data - FG Trading Entities
SELECT DISTINCT
    price.[Month] AS [Month]	
	--,price.[Entity]
    ,price.[Product] AS [Product] 
	,price.[Other_Revenue_Details] AS [Other_Revenue_Details]
	,price.[Trading/Own_Produced] AS [Trading/Own_Produced]
    ,price.[Counterparty] AS [Counterparty]
	,price.[Volume_Type] AS [Volume_Type]
	,'Actual' AS [ValueType]
	,NULL AS [Plan_Year]
    ,SUM([ACT_Revenue_Volumes]) AS [Volume]
    ,SUM([ACT_Revenue_Net_Back_Prices]) AS [Price]
	,SUM([ACT_Revenue_Volumes])*SUM([ACT_Revenue_Net_Back_Prices]) AS [Total_Revenue]
FROM [conformed].[Act_Sales_Volume_Price] price
INNER JOIN [conformed].[Act_Average_Fx_Rates] fxRates 
ON price.[Month] = fxRates.[Month]
WHERE price.[Entity] IN ('3007','3038','3073') --price.[Trading/Own_Produced] = 'OWN' 
AND fxRates.[Functional_Currency] = 'DZD' AND fxRates.[Transactional_Currency] = 'USD'
--and price.[Month] = 202203 and price.[Entity] = '3004' 
GROUP BY price.[Month], price.[Product], price.[Other_Revenue_Details], price.[Trading/Own_Produced], 
price.[Counterparty], price.[Volume_Type] --,price.[Entity]

UNION

--Forecast data - FG Trading Entities
SELECT DISTINCT
    price.[Month] AS [Month]	
	--,price.[Entity]
    ,price.[Product] AS [Product] 
	,price.[Other_Revenue_Details] AS [Other_Revenue_Details]
	,price.[Trading/Own_Produced] AS [Trading/Own_Produced]
    ,price.[Counterparty] AS [Counterparty]
	,price.[Volume_Type] AS [Volume_Type]
	,CONCAT('RF',price.[Scenario]) AS [ValueType]
	,price.[Plan_Year] AS [Plan_Year]
    ,SUM([FCT_Revenue_Volumes]) AS [Volume]
    ,SUM([FCT_Revenue_Net_Back_Prices]) AS [Price]
	,SUM([FCT_Revenue_Volumes])*SUM([FCT_Revenue_Net_Back_Prices]) AS [Total_Revenue]
FROM [conformed].[Fct_Sales_Volume_Price] price
INNER JOIN [conformed].[Fct_Average_Fx_Rates] fxRates 
ON price.[Month] = fxRates.[Month] AND price.[Scenario] = fxRates.[Scenario] AND price.[Version] = fxRates.[Version] AND price.[Plan_Year] = fxRates.[Plan_Year]
WHERE price.[Version] IN 
(
SELECT CASE WHEN [Scenario] = 5 THEN 6 ELSE 1 END AS [Version] FROM [conformed].[Fct_Sales_Volume_Price] inr
WHERE inr.[Month] = price.[Month] AND inr.[Entity] = price.[Entity] AND inr.[Product] = price.[Product] 
AND inr.[Other_Revenue_Details] = price.[Other_Revenue_Details] AND inr.[Scenario] = price.[Scenario] AND inr.[Plan_Year] = price.[Plan_Year]
)
AND price.[Plan_Year] = (SELECT DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE()))
--AND price.[Trading/Own_Produced] = 'OWN' 
AND price.[Entity] IN ('3007','3038','3073')
AND fxRates.[Functional_Currency] = 'DZD' AND fxRates.[Transactional_Currency] = 'USD'
--and price.[Month] = 202203 and price.[Entity] = '3004' and price.[Plan_Year] = 2022
GROUP BY price.[Month], price.[Product],price.[Other_Revenue_Details],price.[Trading/Own_Produced]
,price.[Scenario],price.[Plan_Year],price.[Counterparty],price.[Volume_Type]
--,price.[Entity]

UNION

--Budget data - FG Trading Entities
SELECT DISTINCT
	price.[Month] AS [Month]	
	--,price.[Entity]
    ,price.[Product] AS [Product] 
	,price.[Other_Revenue_Details] AS [Other_Revenue_Details]
	,price.[Trading/Own_Produced] AS [Trading/Own_Produced]
    ,price.[Counterparty] AS [Counterparty]
	,price.[Volume_Type] AS [Volume_Type]
	,'Budget' AS [ValueType]
	,price.[Plan_Year] AS [Plan_Year]
    ,SUM([Budget_Revenue_Volumes]) AS [Volume]
    ,SUM([Budget_Revenue_Net_Back_Prices]) AS [Price]
	,SUM([Budget_Revenue_Volumes])*SUM([Budget_Revenue_Net_Back_Prices]) AS [Total_Revenue]
FROM [conformed].[Budget_Sales_Volume_Price] price
INNER JOIN [conformed].[Fct_Average_Fx_Rates] fxRates 
ON price.[Month] = fxRates.[Month] AND price.[Scenario] = fxRates.[Scenario] AND price.[Version] = fxRates.[Version] AND price.[Plan_Year] = fxRates.[Plan_Year]
WHERE price.[Plan_Year] = (SELECT DATEPART(YEAR,GETDATE())-1)
--AND price.[Trading/Own_Produced] = 'OWN' 
AND price.[Entity] IN ('3007','3038','3073')
AND fxRates.[Functional_Currency] = 'DZD' AND fxRates.[Transactional_Currency] = 'USD'
--and price.[Month] = 202203 and price.[Entity] = '3004' and price.[Plan_Year] = 2021
GROUP BY price.[Month], price.[Product],price.[Other_Revenue_Details],price.[Trading/Own_Produced]
,price.[Scenario],price.[Plan_Year],price.[Counterparty],price.[Volume_Type]
--,price.[Entity]

) subQ1
